QuestData.Title: Cultist Incursion
QuestData.Description: <It appears the Avatar of Freya was right. The undead were not able to enter Sholazar Basin before the Lifeblood Pillar was brought down -- they used their living agents from the Cult of the Damned instead.>$B$B<You'd best warn her about the Lich King's living agents within Sholazar Basin.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the Avatar of Freya at the Rainspeaker Rapids.
QuestData.RewardText: The living... willingly serve the Lich King?$B$BAll this time I've been searching for the wrong enemy, $r. Let us make haste and uproot these cultists from these lands.
